name: 李建錠
objective:
本課程為非資訊科系的程式設計入門課程，期能讓學生瞭解運算思維概念，並對資訊程式運作與設計方式有初步掌握。課程將以 Python 語言為實作演練工具，透過實際規劃、編寫、除錯與測試等階段，逐步培養學生基本程式設計能力。課程也將規劃人工智慧 (AI) 入門概念與基本做法，並由學生實際動手完成 AI 應用於文化發展領域議題的專題作品，讓學生能體會 AI 新科技對產業發展的現況，並思考面對未來 AI 新時代的準備方向。
This course is an introductory programming course for non-computer science majors, aiming to facilitate students understand the concept of computational thinking and gain a preliminary grasp of information program operation and design methods. The course will employ Python as the implementation and practice tool, gradually cultivating students' basic programming skills through practical planning, coding, debugging, and testing stages. Furthermore, the course will introduce the concepts and basic practices of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Students will have hands-on experience completing a project applying AI to cultural development issues. This allows students to appreciate the status of AI technology in industry and contemplate the preparation directions for the upcoming AI era.
